tool_description: Matches patient clinical profile against institutional or standardized treatment protocols to identify the most appropriate care pathways.

patient_profile.description: JSON string containing patient demographics, conditions, and relevant clinical data

care_setting.description: Healthcare setting (inpatient, outpatient, emergency, icu, surgery)

institution_type.description: Type of healthcare facility (academic, community, specialty)

error_messages: Invalid patient profile format: Provide valid JSON string with required patient data fields.
Invalid condition code: Primary condition must be a valid medical diagnosis code.
Resource mismatch: Some specified resources are not recognized in the system.
usage: Provide patient_profile, condition_primary, care_setting, and urgency_level. Add condition_secondary, institution_type, and available_resources for more precise matching.

matched_protocols.description: Array of matching protocol names with match scores

protocol_steps.description: Sequential steps in the recommended protocol
